auctionsystem.usage: Usage: !auction open (increments) (minimum bid) [Optional parameters: (auto close timer) (nopoints)]
auctionsystem.set.usage: Usage: !auction set (extension timer). A maximum of 29 and a minimum of 6 is allowed
auctionsystem.opened: Auction is now opened! You can bid in increments of at least $1. Minimum bid allowed is $2! Start bidding with !bid (amount)
auctionsystem.auto.timer.msg: Auction will auto close in $1 seconds!
auctionsystem.err.closed: There is no auction currently running.
auctionsystem.err.no.bids: Auction closed! No one placed a bid.
auctionsystem.closed: Auction closed! Winner of this auction is $1 with $2! Congratulations!
auctionsystem.warnTime.force: The auction closes in $1 seconds! Current top bidder is $2 with $3! Do we have $4?
auctionsystem.warnTime.newBid: New highest bidder is $2 with $3! The auction stays open for another $1 seconds! Do we have $4?
auctionsystem.warnTime: The auction closes in $1 seconds! Current top bidder is $2 with $3!
auctionsystem.warn.force: The auction is about to close! Current top bidder is $1 with $2! Do we have $3?
auctionsystem.err.points: You don't have enough $1 to bid. Your balance is $2
auctionsystem.err.increments: This auction is in increments of $1! Next bid is $2
auctionsystem.lastWinner.err: No auction has yet been completed! No winner to show.
auctionsystem.lastWinner: The last auctions' winning bid was $2 from $1! Congratulations!
